message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  How about $10,000?  This would be a great deal for both of us.
I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I have to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need $11,500 to make it worth my while.
